name: pew Pew PEW (Autumnotopia)
description:
A three player brawler made for PIGSquad's July Summer Slow Jam! (But two players is okay, too)

As you lose health, you gain room for more attacks and those that you already have get better! But be careful, every time you use a special attack may be the last time! (...Until you pick up a new one, that is) 

Hypothetically it's fully functional and playable, but full disclosure: we haven't actually had a chance to playtest it yet. Right now it's only playable with controllers attached, we specifically were testing controls with joycons!

Credits:
Autumn Greenley
Vee Nowell
Andrew Tran

(We didn't make the music, it was creative commons 0 stuff that I'll track down credits for soon!)
